PAGLIUCA: Thank you, your Honor. 6 CROSS EXAMINATION (Cont'd) 7 BY MR. PAGLIUCA: 8 Q. Dr. Rocchio, we were talking about Exhibit 3, and as I understand it, this is the most recent attempt to validate the sexual grooming model of child sexual abusers; is that correct? 9 A. That's the most recent attempt to validate this particular model, yes. 10 Q. OK. Well -- 11 A. Actually, it's a recent. I'm not sure what research has been done since that. 12 Q. You were asked by the government to give the government whatever articles you thought were helpful with regard to your testimony here today. Is that correct? 13 A. I was asked by the government to give examples of articles that pertained to the subject matter of my testimony today. 14 Q. OK. And as I understand it, this is a hearing to determine whether or not there were scientifically valid principles under federal law to admit this testimony. You understand that. 15 A. Yes, I do. 16 Q. And one of the things that you did was provide the SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00008000

Q. Dr. Rocchio, we were talking about Exhibit 3, and as I understand it, this is the most recent attempt to validate the sexual grooming model of child sexual abusers; is that correct? A. That's the most recent attempt to validate this particular model, yes. Q. OK. Well -- A. Actually, it's a recent. I'm not sure what research has been done since that. Q. You were asked by the government to give the government whatever articles you thought were helpful with regard to your testimony here today. Is that correct? A. I was asked by the government to give examples of articles that pertained to the subject matter of my testimony today. Q. OK. And as I understand it, this is a hearing to determine whether or not there were scientifically valid principles under federal law to admit this testimony. You understand that. A. Yes, I do. Q.
